task_text: Increase Wolf Julia's salary by 5000 in the employee registry.

text_blocks: I see that I'm acting for an External user (department='External'). According to the rules, External users have very limited access and cannot access employee data including salaries.

input.message: I cannot process this request. As an external user, you do not have access to employee records or salary information. Salary modifications can only be performed by Corporate Leadership (CEO, COO, CFO). Please contact HR or Corporate Leadership if you need assistance with this matter.
